fullName: Book Management API Validations: Create a book with valid details

labels.name: story
labels.value: Create a book with valid details

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Create a book with valid details

name: Create a book with valid details

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMjE2MjRAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4MjN9.tm2x0Ak39vICUeialEqEZ3-1hN81QwXmpeV3dM93iLQ","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "AutomationQA", author "Bob", year 2025, and summary "Test coverage" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=23051, name='AutomationQA', author='Bob', published_year=2025, book_summary='Test coverage', cover_image_url='null'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 200, Body: {"book_summary":"Test coverage","id":23051,"author":"Bob","published_year":2025,"name":"AutomationQA"}
Then  validate book creation response code is 200 and response contains book details
Book Creation: expected 200, actual 200, name: AutomationQA
